info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 3:03AM CDT until April 21 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR GOLIAD AND NORTHEASTERN BEE COUNTIES... At 303 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weesatche to near Charco to 9 miles east of Tulsita to Pettus, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Ander, Berclair, Weesatche, Weser, Coleto Creek Park, Tulsita, Normanna, Pettus, Tuleta and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 584. US Highway 183 between mile markers 626 and 654. US Highway 59 between mile markers 654 and 692. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
